titles.title: Jesus, Won't You Come By Here

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, won't you come by here. (Repeat 3x.)
Now is such a needy time.
O, now is such a needy time.
Jesus, won't you come by here.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, I'm praying down upon my knees.
Lord, I'm praying down upon my knees.
Jesus, won't you come by here.
